DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blind , randomize , control study two arm evaluate JointStem treatment subject osteoarthritis . Following 2-week screening period , approximately 45 subject randomly assign one follow two arm 2:1 ratio ( 2 JointStem : 1 positive control ) . After last subject complete 6-month visit ( Visit 6 ) data management team confirm data issue , database lock blind open statistical analysis . Subjects schedule 9-month 12-month follow-up visit ( Visits 7 8 ) .
